title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: The issue occurs when a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed. When a URL is accessed in this state, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR: The issue should be resolved so that when a Tomcat 7 instance has no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it returns an HTTP error 404 as expected.
